page.about.greeting: Hi! My name is Ivan, I'm a frontend developer from Moscow.
page.about.technical: I work with React, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, RTK / TanStack Query, and specialize in microfrontend architecture (Webpack Module Federation). I have experience developing high-load systems in product teams (Sberbank) and enterprise applications for major industrial clients (EVRAZ, SIBUR). I've worked with Next.js, Node.js, Vite, Storybook, GSAP, and set up CI/CD (Jenkins) and deployment (Nginx).
page.about.freetime: I'm constantly learning new technologies: currently diving deeper into microfrontend architecture and 3D animation (Three.js, shaders). In my free time, I experiment with AI and API integrations — I've built several Telegram bots with OpenAI API, Google Calendar, and other services. I'm also into creative pursuits: I write music (been playing guitar for 15+ years), edit videos, draw, and do handicrafts — I love creating new things and experimenting.
page.about.goal: I'm looking for opportunities to work on complex technical challenges where I can apply my experience with microfrontend architecture and contribute to building innovative products.
page.404.subtitle: Page Not Found
page.404.description: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist. It might have been moved or deleted.
